description: You walk in the grassy plains among the herbs that grow here. The wind is
strong and rough. Far to the north you can see the foothills and further on
mountain peaks are visible.
316.name: Grassy plains

description: The plains extend far to the north.
When you look to the east you notice at small path.
A few large hills rise up, looking down on a small forest to the
west, and the much larger Northern Shire Forest to the north.  A path
runs over one hill down to the small forest to the west, coming from
the Northern Plains to the east.
348.name: Western Hills

description: You are standing on the ancient path which runs north and south.
The path is hardly visible here.
334.name: Ancient path

description: You see the ancient path.
You trace the path carefully and see no immediate dangers.
You are walking on a long path in the east-west direction.
The surroundings are green, vegetated foothills.
You are able to force your way through some dense plants to the north.
310.name: Path in the foothills

description: You can't really see much through the vegetation on the foothills.
To the east you notice that the path continues towards a T-intersection.
You just see the path through the foothills.
The rock formations are made of seven huge monolith placed in a circle.
You notice it's possible to enter the ring.
You find yourself located between the bridge and the rock formations.
As you approach the formations you begin to realize the true size of
them, about 15 feet tall and almost perfect rectangular shape.
You feel impressed with the awesome sight.
337.name: Ancient path

description: To the east you enter the ring of stones. You wonder if it's safe.
To the west the ancient path leads across the wooden bridge.
You walk in some grassy plains. The wind is strong and rough. To the
north you can see the foothills and further on mountain peaks are visible.
320.name: Grassy plains

description: The plains extend into small foothills to the north.
The plains extend far to the west.
The plains extend far to the south.
You are moving on an ancient path. The path is slightly covered with
leaves and branches.
To the north you can see the T-crossing and the path continues south.
332.name: Ancient path

description: As you look to the north you see a T-intersection.
The ancient path continues through the plains.
You walk in the grassy plains. The wind is fairly strong.
321.name: Grassy plains

description: The pool is crystal clear, but as you look into it you notice that
you can't see the bottom of it ... it must be pretty deep.
You are standing by a pool in the small foothills. It is clear and cold.
A dock extends out over the water to the north.
326.name: Pool in the foothills

description: You see a small dock with a shack in the middle.
To the south a path winds its way south into the plains.
You puke.
You stand in the hall of G'harne. The walls are dressed with strange
carvings, symbolizing human sacrifice and people worshipping giant worms.
Disgusting slime and gore are also very dominant in your view of this room.
344.name: Hall of G'harne

description: It looks like a good idea just to run in this direction.
The Grassy Plain continues to the west towards large forests and a
few hills.  The path continues over the hills to whatever lies beyond
it.  The path leads back east to the Northern Plains, and Westbridge.
329.name: Grassy Plains

description: You are walking on a wide road with trail marks on it.  To the north
you see the village of Ofcol and to the south there is the T intersection.
You can enter the foothills west.  The foothills to your east are too
steep to climb.
313.name: Road to Ofcol

description: The path wanders its way through a small forest between The Shire
and The Northern Plains.  The Northern Plains are located back east.
The Shire and Hilp Village are located to the west.
350.name: A Small Forest

description: You are walking on the long, narrow path through the foothills.
To your east you see a T-intersection and to the west the path
continues far.
311.name: Path in the foothills

description: You can go to the T-intersection this way.
You can see the long path through the plains.
You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains.
You feel the strong winds blow through your hair as you watch the
beautiful landscaping here. To the east and west you see the grassy plains.
The path extends into small foothills to the north and also continues south.
305.name: Path in the plains

description: The path continues into the small foothills.
The path continues towards Westbridge.
The pictures are depicting evil rituals.
You see druids pouring blood over herbs on an altar like this one.
There are people calling giant worms into existence with dark spells.
The stones of G'harne tower fifteen feet over you.
The giant stones are made of a material you haven't seen before.
It resembles black marble, but somehow feels different.
You move closer to examine the sacrifice altar of G'harne.
The altar is about 3 feet high, 10 feet long and 4 feet wide.
It has engraved pictures of death rituals and horrifying worms.
You are in the center of a 15-foot tall monolith like black stones.
In the center of the ring formed by the monolith you can't help
noticing a big sacrifice altar. The ground is covered with dirt, but the
altar shows no sign of such. West of here is the ancient path.
339.name: Stones of G'harne

description: You see the ancient path and the wooden bridge here.
You see a tunnel down there.
The rock formations are made of 7 huge, monolith like stones, placed
in a symbolic circle.
You notice it's possible to enter the ring.
You have stepped upon a wooden bridge. It looks old but safe to cross.
It is made of a wood you haven't seen before.
336.name: Wooden bridge

description: The path continues, further ahead you notice some rock formations.
The ancient path leads west and turns north further ahead.
You are standing on the ancient path which runs north and south.
The path is hardly visible here.
333.name: Ancient path

description: You see the ancient path.
You trace the path carefully and see no immediate dangers.
The markers seems like normal stones, but the way they are
arranged makes you think there is something special about them.
The path runs north and east from here.  You notice some markers placed
along the side of the path.
335.name: Ancient path

description: You see the ancient path winding its way north from here. Looks safe.
Further ahead you see a bridge over a small creak.
You are standing in the foothills. To the west, well hidden among the small
foothills and pines, you see a small hut. To the north you can see
the foothills, and some pine forest. Further on mountain peaks are visible.
330.name: In front of hut in foothills

description: The steep foothills seems hard to climb
The foothills extend far to the east.
You see a small crumbled hut here, must be a hermit living here.
To the south the foothills extend into plains far to the south.
You walk in the beautiful grassy plains. The wind is strong and rough.
Far to the north you can see the foothills and further on mountain peaks
are visible.
318.name: Grassy plains

description: The plains extend far to the north.
The plains extend far to the east.
The plains extend far to the south.
You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains.
You feel the strong winds blow through your hair as you study
the beautiful landscaping here. The path continues east, north
and west leads to plains and you see the path towards the north
gate of Westbridge to the south.
300.name: Path in the plains

description: You see the grassy plains.
You see the grassy plains.
You walk in the grassy plains among the herbs which grow here. The wind is
strong and rough. Far to the north you can see the foothills and farther on
mountain peaks are visible.
338.name: Grassy plains

description: The plains extend far to the west.
A small stream trickles across the small dirt path in the forest.
The crick runs south to north, and have very little water, or at least
looks like it has very little water.
352.name: A Small Stream

description: You are walking in some foothills. It is rather hard to move here.
Further to the north you can see the mountains towering over you.
Several pinetrees grow here.
327.name: Foothills

description: To the south a steep slope runs down to a small path in the foothills.
You are walking in the steep foothills. It is rather hard to move here.
Further to the north you can see the mountains towering over you.
Several pinetrees grow here.
325.name: Steep foothills

description: The path wanders its way through a small forest between The Shire
and The Northern Plains.  The Northern Plains are located back east.
The Shire and Hilp Village are located to the west.
349.name: A Small Forest

description: The mountains seems dark and all most alive, as they contrast against
the sky.
The all too quiet trees suggest that something roams these woods.
You are walking in the steep foothills. It is rather hard to move here.
To the north you can see the mountains towering over you.  Pine trees
grow here.
324.name: Steep foothills

description: The path continues up the mountain.
The foothills extend far to the west.
The foothills extend downwards to the south. In the horizon you can
see the City Of Westbridge.
You walk in the grassy plains among the herbs which grow here. The wind is
strong and rough. To the north you can see the foothills and just behind
mountain peaks are visible.
319.name: Grassy plains

description: To the north, the plains extend into small foothills, behind a small hill
you notice something ...
The plains extend far to the east.
The plains extend far to the south.
You are walking on a path situated in the small foothills.
The winds are more than average here but it feels nice. You can follow
the path east or west.
307.name: Path in the foothills

description: Atop the steep hill lies a trail that twists north into a tall
grassy plain.  The wind blows gently here and overlooks the vast
plains to the east which surround the northern side of westbridge.
346.name: Overlooking the Plains

description: You walk in the grassy foothills north of the plains. The wind is rough.
To the north you can see foothills and just behind them mountain peaks
are visible.
322.name: Grassy foothills

description: The small foothills extend into foothills far to the north.
The small foothills extend far to the west.
The small foothills extend into plains far to the south.
You are on the path leading through the small foothills.
The wind blow through your hair as you study the beautiful
landscaping here. From the north you sense a certain freshness.
The path continues east and south. You smell freshness from north.
306.name: Path in the foothills

description: You see grassy plains and perhaps some crystal clear water.
The path in the plains wind through the small foothills.
You walk in the grassy plains among the herbs which grow here. The wind is
strong and rough. Far to the north you can see the foothills and further on
mountain peaks are visible. City of Westbridge is to the south but so are some
VERY steep slopes.
317.name: Grassy plains

description: The plains extend far to the east.
Some VERY steep slopes prevent you from going this way, it might kill you.
You try to climb down the slope.
You slip!
You fall and tumble.
You hit your head HARD.
You die.
You've fallen, and you can't get up!
345.name: Steep slope

description: You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains.
You feel the strong winds blow through your hair as you study
the beautiful landscaping here. The path continues north leading
to plains and you see the gate of Westbridge to the south.
328.name: Path in the plains

description: You try to examine the substance closer, but must refrain from this
as all you really want to do is puke.
You puke.
You are standing in a gloomy tunnel leading south and west, right under
the altar of G'harne.  The walls are covered with a smelly slime, and small
rotting pieces of a meat like substance fills the air with an unbearable
stench.  You might be able to force your way up into fresh air from here.
340.name: Dark smelly tunnels

description: You welcome the sight of fresh air.
You are walking on a narrow path in the foothills.
You feel the strong winds blow through your hair as you study
the beautiful landscaping here. The path goes north and west.
308.name: Path in the foothills

description: You try to examine the substance closer, but must refrain from this
as all you really want to do is puke.
You puke.
You are standing in a gloomy tunnel leading east and west.
The walls are covered with a smelly slime, and small rotting pieces of a
meat like substance fills the air with an unbearable stench.
342.name: Dark smelly tunnels

description: The tunnel continues in this direction.
The tunnel continues in this direction.
BWADR! ...
You are standing in a small smelly tunnel under the plains.
The smell is growing stronger to the west, and so is the density of the
slime and other undeterminable substances ...
343.name: Dark smelly tunnels

description: The unbearable stench is less intensive in this direction.
The tunnel seems to extend into some kind of cave.
You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains.
You feel the strong winds blow through your hair as you study
the beautiful landscaping here. The path continues north and west.
302.name: Path in the plains

description: You are standing on an intersection between 4 paths.  To the west you can
follow a long, narrow path through the foothills.  To the north a wide path
leads to the Village of Ofcol and an ancient path leads towards the south.
To the east, a small road leads into the woods.
312.name: Path Intersection

description: You can see the long narrow path running through the foothills.
Here is a partially hidden, ancient looking path.
You are walking on a path situated in foothills.
To the west you sense a certain freshness and the path continues
south and east.
309.name: Path in the foothills

description: You see the path continues in the foothills.
You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains.
You feel the strong winds blow through your hair as you study
the beautiful landscaping here. The path leads north and south.
To the east and the west you have the grassy plains.
303.name: Path in the plains

description: You notice nothing special, except that the path in the plains continues.
The hermit cooks here.
You are inside Smokey's hut. It is rather old, but serves it purpose.
The walls are covered with jars, and all kinds of weird stuff. Large
green plants grow all over the room. You feel like you're in heaven.
It keeps its habitant from the rough winds and dangerous beasts of the
plains and foothills. There is a small fireplace here.
331.name: Smokey's hut

description: Through the door you can see the foothills.
You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains.
You feel the strong winds blow through your hair as you study
the beautiful landscaping here. The Path leads north and south.
304.name: Path in the plains

description: The path continues north as small foothills begins to appear.
The path leads south towards the town.
You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains.
You feel the strong winds blow through your hair as you study
the beautiful landscaping here. The path continues east and west.
301.name: Path in the plains

description: You walk in the steep foothills.  It is rather hard to move here.
To the north you can see a grassy valley with wildflowers.  A rather
large hill looms directly to the west with a pretty steep climb.
323.name: Steep foothills

description: You see a path toward the valley.
The foothills extend far to the east.
On the horizon you can see the City of Westbridge.
You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains.  You feel
the strong winds blow through your hair as you study the beautiful
landscaping here.  The path continues east, north and west leads to
plains.
347.name: Grassy Plains

description: The path wanders its way through a small forest between The Shire
and The Northern Plains.  The Northern Plains are located back east.
The Shire and Hilp Village are located to the west.
351.name: A Small Forest

description: The sign says:
Loyal citizens of Midgaard.  These are the earthly remains of the
three heretics 'Tabor', 'Wyatt' and 'Funky' of this world.
Having forged themselves to immortality, they called upon themselves
the anger of the cat walke cat walke implementators.
Let this be a lesson to all .....
-- the Powers that Be.
Nothing is left of this corpse but a few strands of skin still clinging
to the rope, and a few scattered bones on the ground.
Though the vultures and parasites have wreaked havoc on this corpse,
you can still make out the recognizable features of the legendary
Funky.
You walk in the grassy plains. On this little hill you can see
three gallows, with rotting human tissue hanging from the ropes.
The rotting corpse swinging on one of the ropes seems familiar.
There is a sign here.
315.name: Gallow hill

description: The plains extend far to the north.
The plains extend far to the west.
To the south you can see a small path in the plains.
You are standing outside the village of Ofcol.
The village looks very small, but still a nice and safe place to stay.
You may enter the city to the north or journey towards the
T-intersection in the southern direction.
314.name: Outside Ofcol

description: The tunnel comes to an abrupt end here. It simply looks like it
hasn't been excavated further.  North of here the tunnel makes a turn east.
341.name: Dead end of tunnel

description:
She seems like a nice person with no interest in harming you or others.
She wears a minimum of clothing and has big ... eyes.
304.room_name: There is a citizen of Ofcol here glaring at you ... stranger!
304.name: the citizen~

description:
Shudde-M'ell is about 15 ft long and is surrounded by an evil stench,
The worm is the protector of the treasure of G'harne and has been so
for as long anyone can remember.
305.room_name: Shudde-M'ell the Giant worm of G'harne is guarding his treasure.
305.name: Shudde-M'ell~

description:
Luxan is dressed in a strange jacket.
He looks like a mean trader from the outskirts of Westbridge.
His life is seems to be totally occupied with trading.
He looks very fit and capable of protecting his goods.
306.room_name: Luxan the Shopkeeper is here, eager to sell you anything.
306.name: Luxan~

description:
The Innkeeper looks skilled in brewing different beers and mixing the
wierdest drinks known. He also looks very big.
308.room_name: An Innkeeper is here waiting for your order.
308.name: the Innkeeper~

description: It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.
309.name: the cute rabbit~

description:
Aruncus is a tall, skinny druid with a face marked by nature.
He seems to be in peace with himself and his surroundings.
300.room_name: Aruncus the Druid is walking around here, searching for herbs.
300.name: Aruncus the Druid~

description:
Smokey has everything you need. He looks totaly wated and
smells of ref. He sits in the middle of the room, smoken
another one, waiting for his rabbit to be done cooking.
301.room_name: Smokey JR stands here, doing his thing.
301.name: Smokey JR~
subroutines:
M GIVE 330 bundletorrquest~
M GIVE 331 drugdealershipring~

description:
Ravan's pet dragon is about 3 ft. tall with small pointy teeth.
The small wings are eagerly trying to lift her from the ground,
but so far they haven't succeeded.
350.room_name: Ravan's pet dragon is bouncing around here flapping her cute wings.
350.name: the pet dragon~

description:
He seems like a nice person with no interest in harming you or others.
He wears normal, light clothing and has an anonymous face.
303.room_name: There is a citizen of Ofcol here glaring at you ... stranger!
303.name: the citizen~
